    • Method Detail

      • preponeJobs

        public int preponeJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                       java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                       java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                       java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                       java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                       int amountOfNodeStepsToShift,
                       int currentTime,
                       int schedulingInterval,
                       DC handledDC)
        Description copied from interface: ShiftingStrategy
        Prepones jobs that are selceted according to the implemented startegy, to adjust the power consumption profile of the DC.
        Specified by:
        preponeJobs in interface ShiftingStrategy
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        amountOfNodeStepsToShift - Amount of node steps that are requested to be shifted according to the current configuration of the power demand flexibility provision techniques.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        schedulingInterval - Length of the currently scheduled DR event in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.
        Returns:
        Amount of node steps that were actually shifted.

        public java.util.List<BatchJob> getPreponableJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,

                                                  java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                                  int currentTime)
        Description copied from interface: ShiftingStrategy
        Retrieves a list of all jobs that are preponable in the currently considered interval.
        Specified by:
        getPreponableJobs in interface ShiftingStrategy
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        Returns:
        List of all jobs that are actually preponable.

        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
